about_the_game:
Get your spy on
Working as an agent for the intelligence agency Espion, you are tasked with infiltrating a rival company to disrupt their operations from the inside.
There is one simple objective: eliminate the CEO. To reach them however, you must start from the lower levels of the building and work your way up to the penthouse.



Refine your arsenal
Switch out weapon parts to tweak or overhaul your tools of destruction on the fly. Choose from a variety gadgets throughout a run to refine your build. With an appropriate selection, a silenced auto-shotgun with a scope can be just as formidable as a conventional assault rifle. Unleash the creativity (and bullets) of your custom masterpiece upon all those who stand in your way.



Lethal force required
Battle a slew of foes on each floor, from savage dogs and security guards, all the way to minigun wielding freaks of nature and deadly cyborgs. If that wasn't enough, every fourth floor contains a boss fight against an extra formidable opponent.



Work as a team
Join forces with up to 3 other agents. Be warned though, the more agents, the tougher the enemy forces you'll face!



█████ CLASSIFIED █████
Powerful items may be hidden throughout a run that could completely transform your build into the ultimate espionage force. Search high and low for these, as well as hidden entrances to other floors of the building.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains frequent cartoon/low poly blood and violence.

short_description: Shoot, dodge, and explode your way through the floors of a rival company's headquarters. Collect gadgets and weapon parts on your way to assemble an arsenal dangerous enough to take on a private military in this fast paced FPS roguelike.
